DOC.brief_summary: NT 201 Botulinum toxin type A preparation free complexing protein . Injected muscle , NT 201 cause reversible local relaxation inject muscle . Botulinum toxin type A widely use aesthetic treatment mimic wrinkle . This study investigate safety efficacy NT 201 treatment glabellar frown line .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy NT 201 , Free Complexing Proteins , Treatment Glabellar Frown Lines
DOC.criteria: moderate severe glabellar frown line maximum frown ( ( severity score 2 3 Facial Wrinkle Scale ( FWS ) assess investigator 's rating : 0 = 'none ' , 1 = 'mild ' , 2 = 'moderate ' , 3 = 'severe ' Stable medical condition Age : 18 65 year ( inclusively ) Previous treatment Botulinum toxin serotype upper third part face within last 6 month Previous treatment biodegradable filler glabellar area within last 12 month Previous insertion permanent material glabellar area , include fat graft ( regardless time previous treatment study ) Any surgery glabellar area include surgical removal corrugator , procerus , depressor supercilii muscle combination , scar glabellar area Any plan cosmetic procedure upper third part face trial period Inability substantially lessen glabellar frown line even physically spread apart Marked facial asymmetry ptosis eyelid and/or eyebrow History facial nerve palsy Any infection area injection site
